sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import '../styles/StudentFeesPage.css'; import axios from 'axios'; import SideBar from '../components/global-layout/SideBar'; import GreyBar from '../components/global-layout/GreyBar'; import ClassFeeMenu from '../components/class-components/ClassFeeMenu'; import '../styles/ClassListMenu.css'; import FeeSubTab from '../components/class-components/FeeSubTab'; export const basicTitle = { position: 'relative', left: '27px', top: '27px', width: '254px', height: '28px', fontSize: '25px', fontWeight: 500, fontStyle: 'normal', fontStretch: 'normal', lineHeight: 1.2, letterSpacing: 'normal', textAlign: 'left', color: '#000000' } export const optionalTitle = { position: 'relative', left: '27px', top: '52px', width: '254px', height: '28px', fontSize: '25px', fontWeight: 500, fontStyle: 'normal', fontStretch: 'normal', lineHeight: 1.2, letterSpacing: 'normal', textAlign: 'left', color: '#000000', marginBottom: '85px' } export const chargesblock= { gridColumn: '1/-1', width: '100%', display: 'flex', position: 'relative', top: '60px', marginBottom: '55px', } export const chargesblockLast= { gridColumn: '1/-1', width: '100%', display: 'flex', position: 'relative', top: '60px', marginBottom: '55px', paddingBottom: '50px', borderBottom: 'solid 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)' } export const chargeType = { width: '45%', height: '21px', fontSize: '18px', fontWeight: 'normal', fontStyle: 'normal', fontStretch: 'normal', lineHeight: 1.28, letterSpacing: 'normal', textAlign: 'left', color: '#000000', position: 'relative', left : '27px' } export const chargeAmount = { width: '92px', height: '21px', fontSize: '18px', fontWeight: 'normal', fontStyle: 'normal', fontStretch: 'normal', lineHeight: 1.28, letterSpacing: 'normal', textAlign: 'right', color: '#000000', position: 'relative', left: '42.5%' } class BeginnerFeeStructure extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); } state = { student: [], isOpen: 'none', classWhich: '', tabTitle: '', feesStructure: { dayCareTuition: 34000, dayCareLunch: 7000, dayCareSwimming: 1500, dayCareHalf: 600, dayCareFull: 800, personalInsurance: 1500, piano: 5000, guitar: 4500, skating: 4500, taekwodo: 4500, ballet: 4500, transportZone1: 8000, transportZone2: 9500, transportZone3: 12500, transportZone4: 14000, transportZone5: 17000, transportZone6: 20000, beginnerTuition: 35000, beginnerLunch: 7000, beginnerSwimming: 2500, pp1Tuition: 35000, pp1Lunch: 7500, pp1Swimming: 2500, pp2Tuition: 35000, pp2Lunch: 7500, pp2Swimming: 2500, grade1Tuition: 36000, grade1Lunch: 8000, grade1Swimming: 2500, grade2Tuition: 36000, grade2Lunch: 8000, grade2Swimming: 2500, } } handleClick = () =>{ if(this.state.isOpen == 'none'){ this.setState({ isOpen: 'block' }) } else if (this.state.isOpen == 'block') this.setState({ isOpen: 'none' }) console.log(this.state.isOpen) } componentDidMount(){ axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/students`).then(res =>{ console.log(res) this.setState({ student: res.data }) }) } chooseClass = () =>{ switch(this.state.classWhich){ case 'Day care': this.setState({ tabTitle: 'Day care Fee Structure' }); break; case 'Beginner': this.setState({ tabTitle: 'Beginner Fee Structure' }); break; case 'PP1': this.setState({ tabTitle: 'PP1 Fee Structure' }); break; case 'PP2': this.setState({ tabTitle: 'PP2 Fee Structure' }); break; case 'Grade 1': this.setState({ tabTitle: 'Grade 1 Fee Structure' }); break; case 'Grade 2': this.setState({ tabTitle: 'Grade 2 Fee Structure' }); break; } } printStructure = () =>{ var content = document.getElementsByClassName("componentContainer")[0]; var pri = document.getElementById("ifmcontentstoprint").contentWindow; pri.document.open(); pri.document.write(content.innerHTML); pri.document.close(); pri.focus(); pri.print(); } render(){ let choosenClass = localStorage.getItem('class') console.log(choosenClass) return(

Basic charges

Tuition

Ksh.{choosenClass ==="Grade 1" || choosenClass ==="Grade 2" ? this.state.feesStructure.grade1Tuition : this.state.feesStructure.beginnerTuition}

Lunch

Ksh. {choosenClass ==="Grade 1" || choosenClass ==="Grade 2" ? this.state.feesStructure.grade1Lunch : this.state.feesStructure.beginnerLunch}

Swimming

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.beginnerSwimming}

Half-day day care

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.dayCareHalf}

Full-day day care

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.dayCareFull}

Annual Insurance

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.personalInsurance}

Optional charges

Piano

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.piano}

Guitar

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.guitar}

Skating

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.skating}

Tae kwo ndo

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.taekwodo}

Ballet

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.ballet}

Transport charges

Zone 1-Delta to Joyland along the road.

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.transportZone1}

Zone 2-Mifereji, Kahigo,Foresight,Guango & Kigwaru

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.transportZone2}

Zone 3- Muchatha, Clifftop, Sacred Heart, Gacharage, Lane 29

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.transportZone3}

Zone 4- Ndenderu, Gachie

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.transportZone4}

Zone 5- Banana, Platinum, Runda Gate

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.transportZone5}

Zone 6- Gigiri, Thigiri

Ksh.{this.state.feesStructure.transportZone6}

Sibling discounts

No sibling

Ksh 00.00

2nd sibling: 10% off tuition fees, 20% off transport fee

Ksh 00.00

3rd sibling and above: 15% off tuition fees, 20% off transport fee

Ksh 00.00

) } } export default BeginnerFeeStructure;
